page.title: 13A Day in the Life of.....(3)
page.content: MOTHER (Continued) .....Because we went early we were able get all our own shopping done before the rush started and arrived home in time for Elizabeth to watch Playschool whilst I made my husband and I a cup of coffee and I prepared the lunch. Nick and Richard came home from school at 12.10p.m. in time to see Mooncat and Company while I put lunch out.After lunch,and making sure that Nick and Richard were back at school for 1p.m. I washed the pots and cleaned the kitchen.My husband needed help to make a delivery,then I was able to clean through the house,make out an invoice before collecting Nick and Richard from school.Today I had to go to the local shop for a jelly to accompany the strawberries I had boughtt in the morning.
